app_abouttheAppMessage1: This app is designed to help users manage and store their notes.
app_abouttheAppMessage2: You can use the plus button in the bottom right corner to add a note. You can edit or delete the notes you have added by clicking on them.
app_abouttheAppMessage3: Backup and restore options are provided to ensure the security of your notes. You can use the menu in the top right corner to take a backup.
database_folderandFileNameSelection: Please enter a file name and select a backup location.
database_fileNameWarningMessage:
To take a backup, you must first 
 Select the File Location 
 Backup Name must be at least 5 characters.
database_getBackupMessage:
To take a backup, you must first 
 Select the File Location 
 Backup Name must be at least 5 characters
database_backupRestoreErrorMessage: Failed to load from database backup
infoP1: This app is designed to help users manage and store their notes.
infoP2: You can use the plus button in the bottom right corner to add a note. You can edit or delete the notes you have added by clicking on them.
infoP3: Backup and restore options are provided to ensure the security of your notes. You can use the menu in the top right corner to take a backup.
kilavuz_situationsContent: With the Situations Screen, we can view Situation Information, Add a New Situation, Change or delete the Situation.
kilavuz_categoriesContent: With the Categories Screen, we can view Category Information, Add a New Category, Change or delete Category information.
kilavuz_prioritiesContent: With the Priorities Screen, we can view Priority Information, Add a New Priority, Change or delete Priority information.
kilavuz_notesContent: With the Notes Screen, we can view our Notes, Add New Notes, Change or delete our Notes
kilavuz_getBackupContent: In the Get Backup tab, we can back up our current data by selecting the Documents Folder. When you want to do this, it asks for file access permission. If you do not give permission, you cannot back up.
kilavuz_restoreBackupContent: The Restore Backup tab loads previously taken backups
kilavuz_versionInformationContent: The Version Information tab shows the current version of the application.
kilavuz_abouttheProgramContent: The About the Program tab contains general information about the application.
kilavuz_userGuideContent: The User Guide tab explains how to use the application.
